immigration.stance: End catch-and-release, restore Remain in Mexico, merit-based system.
immigration.additionalStance: Secure border and reduce illegal immigration, including deporting criminal aliens and building more border walls.

abortion.stance: Supports ending Roe v. Wade, states to decide on abortion laws.

healthcare.stance: Expand healthcare choice, eliminate Obamacare mandate, lower drug prices.

economy.stance: Lower taxes, reduce regulations, increase wages.
additionalStances: Opposes cuts to Medicare and Social Security.
Plans to unleash domestic energy production to control inflation.

education.stance: Supports universal school choice, return education control to states.
additionalStances: Supports the right of parents to have a say in school curricula.
Plans to close the Department of Education in Washington, D.C.

foreignPolicy.stance: Pursue peace through strength, focus on economic security as national security.
additionalStances: Restrict Chinese ownership of U.S. infrastructure and critical assets.
End proxy wars and prioritize peace talks.

criminalJustice.stance: Strengthen law enforcement, support law and order.
additionalStances: Increase funding for police, protect qualified immunity for officers.

climateChange.stance: Reject Green New Deal, focus on energy independence.
additionalStances: Exit Paris Climate Accord, end subsidies for wind energy, promote domestic oil and gas production.

administrativeState.stance: Fire rogue bureaucrats, reform federal agencies.
additionalStances: Move federal government jobs outside Washington D.C., crack down on government leaks.

trade.stance: Implement tariffs to reward domestic production, restrict foreign trade practices.
additionalStances: Promote reshoring of manufacturing and secure supply chains.

genderIssues.stance: Recognize only male and female genders assigned at birth.

veterans.stance: Improve services for veterans, reduce veteran homelessness.

infrastructure.stance: Build new 'Freedom Cities', improve parks, beautify public spaces.

drugCrisis.stance: Combat opioid crisis, dismantle drug cartels.

electionPolicy.stance: Reform election laws to secure integrity, ban ballot harvesting.

endorsements.name: Mike Chaney
endorsements.position: Commissioner of Insurance and State Fire Marshal

committees.name: DONALD J. TRUMP FOR PRESIDENT 2024, INC.
DONALD J. TRUMP REPUBLICAN NOMINEE FUND 2024

education.degree: B.A. in Political Science and Economics

roles.role: Vice President of the United States

economy.stance: Build an opportunity economy, cut taxes for middle-class families, lower costs for healthcare, housing, and groceries.
additionalStances: Provide a $6,000 tax cut to families with newborn children.
Promote American-based technology and innovation.
Support labor unions and small businesses.

healthcare.stance: Expand the Affordable Care Act, cap drug prices, and cancel medical debt.
additionalStances: Capped insulin prices at $35 and out-of-pocket drug spending at $2,000 for seniors.
Address maternal mortality rates and expand Medicaid postpartum coverage.

abortion.stance: Restore reproductive rights and sign a national law to protect reproductive freedom.

immigration.stance: Support bipartisan border security, reform immigration system, and provide a pathway to citizenship.
additionalStances: Deploy more detection technology to intercept fentanyl.
Hire more border agents.

climateChange.stance: Expand clean energy investments, reduce household energy costs, and address environmental justice.
additionalStances: Protect public lands and public health.
Hold polluters accountable.

gunControl.stance: Ban assault weapons and high-capacity magazines, expand background checks.
additionalStances: Support red flag laws to prevent gun violence.

criminalJustice.stance: Support funding law enforcement, reduce gun violence, and secure communities.
additionalStances: Ban assault weapons and implement proven gun violence prevention programs.

foreignPolicy.stance: Defend U.S. security, strengthen alliances, and maintain a strong military.
additionalStances: Stand with Israel and pursue a two-state solution.
Continue supporting Ukraine against Russian aggression.

veterans.stance: Expand veteran benefits and address veteran homelessness.
additionalStances: Invest in mental health services and job opportunities for veterans.

education.stance: Strengthen public education, make college more affordable, and support childcare.
additionalStances: Provide student loan relief and expand Pell Grants.
Increase support for HBCUs and community colleges.

electionPolicy.stance: Pass the John Lewis Voting Rights Act, expand vote-by-mail and early voting.

endorsements.name: Bernice King
endorsements.position: President of the Martin Luther King Jr. Center for Nonviolent Social Change

candidateStances.stance: Lower taxes, reduce regulations, increase wages, oppose cuts to Medicare and Social Security.

candidateStances.name: Kamala Harris
candidateStances.stance: Increase government spending on infrastructure and raise taxes on wealthy individuals.

candidateStances.name: Donald Trump
candidateStances.stance: End catch-and-release, restore Remain in Mexico, enforce a merit-based immigration system.

candidateStances.name: Kamala Harris
candidateStances.stance: Create a pathway to citizenship for undocumented immigrants and reduce reliance on detention.

candidateStances.stance: Expand healthcare choice, eliminate the Obamacare mandate, and lower drug prices.

candidateStances.name: Kamala Harris
candidateStances.stance: Proposes expanding Medicare for all, reducing prescription drug costs, and ensuring universal healthcare coverage.

candidateStances.name: Donald Trump
candidateStances.stance: Supports ending Roe v. Wade and letting states decide abortion laws.

candidateStances.name: Kamala Harris
candidateStances.stance: Defends abortion rights, supports legislation to codify Roe v. Wade into federal law.

candidateStances.name: Donald Trump
candidateStances.stance: Rejects the Green New Deal, promotes energy independence, and supports increased oil and gas production.

candidateStances.name: Kamala Harris
candidateStances.stance: Supports aggressive carbon reduction targets, investment in renewable energy, and rejoining the Paris Climate Accord.

candidateStances.name: Donald Trump
candidateStances.stance: Supports law and order, increase funding for police, protect qualified immunity for officers.

candidateStances.name: Kamala Harris
candidateStances.stance: Proposes criminal justice reform, ending cash bail, and reducing mass incarceration.

candidateStances.name: Donald Trump
candidateStances.stance: Defend the Second Amendment and oppose further gun restrictions.

candidateStances.name: Kamala Harris
candidateStances.stance: Supports stronger background checks and banning assault weapons.

candidateStances.name: Donald Trump
candidateStances.stance: Pursue peace through strength, restrict Chinese ownership of critical U.S. assets, and end proxy wars.

candidateStances.name: Kamala Harris
candidateStances.stance: Support diplomatic efforts, strengthen alliances, and prioritize human rights in foreign policy.
